pkgmetadata.longdescription: Thermoluminescence Glow Curve Deconvolution // Deconvolving first-order thermoluminescence glow curves using a modified Levenberg-Marquardt algorithm. It provides the possibility of setting constraints or fixing any of parameters. User-provided initially-guessed values can be used for model initialization. It also offers an interactive way to initialize parameters by clicking with a mouse on a plot at positions where peak maxima should be located. The optimal estimate is obtained by "try- and-error".
